company_context: Finally, AI for the entire software lifecycle. See how agentic AI transforms software delivery Watch GitLab Transcend now Finally, AI for the entire software lifecycle. Your intelligent orchestration platform for DevSecOps Email address Get started Built for how you work Join the 50+ million people already using GitLab. Try for free Define how teams and AI agents work together Customize your workflows for development, testing, security, and deployment. Teams orchestrate from above the software lifecycle while AI agents execute within it, automating repetitive tasks based on the rules and guardrails you set. Your agents turn issues into merge requests, remediate vulnerabilities, and review code — your team remains in control. Meet GitLab Duo Agent Platform Your end-to-end DevOps process in one place From planning to source code management to CI/CD, everything you need to build and ship software faster in one platform. All your data — projects, releases, code — in a single data plane, so your team and agents can work from one source of truth. Explore our Platform Be proactive with security built in, not bolted on Build secure products with fewer security products. Consolidate scanners like SAST, SCA, Secret Detection, and DAST into one platform. Security findings appear directly in merge requests and IDEs. Apply controls for compliance and collect audit-ready evidence automatically in every pipeline. Support complex deployment pipelines, strict uptime requirements, and distributed edge environments. Automotive Accelerate the automotive software lifecycle. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that can help streamline your software development lifecycle. I saw that you're using GitLab, and I think our solution can complement it nicely. Can you tell me a bit about your current data processing workflow?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yes. We're actually pretty happy with GitLab's built-in features, but we do have some custom scripts and tools that we use to process our data. What makes DeepData AI unique, and how do you think it can help us?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, our solution uses machine learning to automate data processing tasks, which can help reduce manual errors and increase efficiency. We've seen our customers reduce their data processing time by up to 50%. Additionally, our solution can integrate with GitLab, so you can continue to use the tools you're familiar with.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That sounds interesting, but I have to say, we're in the middle of a big project right now, and I'm not sure if we have the bandwidth to implement a new solution. Can you tell me more about the implementation process and what kind of resources we'd need to dedicate to it?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely. Our implementation process is pretty straightforward, and we provide dedicated support to ensure a smooth onboarding process. We've had customers up and running in as little as two weeks. As for resources, we'd need to work with your team to integrate our solution with your existing tools, but we can provide most of the heavy lifting.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I see. And what kind of pricing are we looking at? We're a large organization, so we need to make sure that any new solution we bring in is going to be cost-effective.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is based on the number of users and the amount of data being processed. For an organization of your size, we'd be looking at around $50,000 per year, with discounts available for multi-year commitments.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate your honesty, but I have to say, that's a bit out of our budget. We're already investing heavily in our DevSecOps tools, and I'm not sure if we can justify the additional expense. I think we'll have to pass on DeepData AI for now.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Price
Feedback: The seller should have been more prepared to address potential cost concerns and offer more flexible pricing options or a clear ROI analysis to justify the investment in DeepData AI. Sentiment: Neutral
